content.title: Chief Minister's Overseas Scholarship Scheme for Minorities
content.department: Minorities Welfare Department, Government of Telangana
content.details: The scheme 'Chief Minister's Overseas Scholarship Scheme for Minorities' was launched by the Minorities Welfare Department, Government of Telangana in the year 2015-16 for students belonging to the Minority community to pursue Higher Studies in Post Graduate Courses in Foreign Universities. Financial Assistance under this Scheme for studies abroad will be sanctioned to 500 minority students/graduates per year to pursue Postgraduate/Doctoral studies abroad.
benefits: Fees shall be payable in two installments: ₹10.00 Lakhs or the actual fee (whichever is less) upon production of the landing permit/1-94 Card and 1st Semester Results.
Assistance amount sanctioned towards fees and living expenses by way of a grant subject to joining the course.
Eligibility for an educational loan from any Nationalized Bank at prevailing rates of interest.
Awardees permitted to supplement their allowances by undertaking a Research/Teaching Assistantship.
One-way ticket fare paid to selected candidates.
eligibility: The applicant should be a resident of Telangana.
The applicant should belong to the minority community.
The qualifying upper age limit for applicants should not exceed 35 years as of 1st July of the year.
Only one child from a family is eligible.
The awardee cannot be considered for the second or subsequent times.
The applicant should have a valid TOEFL/IELTS & GRE/GMAT.
The applicant should have obtained admission to an accredited Foreign University.
The applicant should possess a valid Passport.
Family income should be less than ₹5 lakhs per annum from all sources.
documents_required: GRE/GMAT or equivalent qualifying exam/test scorecard
Admission offer letter from a Foreign University (I-20, letter of Admission or equivalent)
Copy of the latest Tax Assessment
Copy of Bank Pass Book of Nationalised Bank

faqs.question: When was this scheme launched?
faqs.answer: The scheme was launched in the year 2015-16.

faqs.question: Which department is implementing this scheme?
faqs.answer: Minorities Welfare Department, Government of Telangana.

faqs.question: What is the scholarship amount given to the eligible students?
faqs.answer: The scholarship amount will be up to ₹20 lakhs or as per admission letter, whichever is less.

faqs.question: Who is eligible for the scheme?
faqs.answer: The applicant who belongs to the minority community can apply for this scheme.

faqs.question: What is the age criterion under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The qualifying upper age limit for applicants should not exceed 35 years as of 1st July of the year.

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for the minority communities?
faqs.answer: Yes, this scheme is only for the students of minority communities.

faqs.question: How many children in a family can avail of the benefit of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Only one child from a family is eligible for the scheme.

faqs.question: How many times can benefits of scholarship be availed under the scheme?
faqs.answer: The individual can be awarded only once in a lifetime.

faqs.question: What is the income criterion to avail of the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: Family income should be less than ₹5 lakhs per annum from all sources.

faqs.question: What is the educational qualification required to apply under the scheme?
faqs.answer: For Post Graduate Course: 60% marks or equivalent grade and for Ph.D. Courses: 60% marks or equivalent grade in P.G. course.

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for a resident of Telangana?
faqs.answer: Yes, the applicant should be a resident of Telangana.

faqs.question: Which are the eligible countries to apply for higher education?
faqs.answer: USA, UK, Australia, Canada, Singapore, Germany, New Zealand, Japan, France and South Korea.

faqs.question: How can an applicant avail of the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: To avail of the benefits of the scheme, the applicant can submit the application form through 'Telangana ePASS' website.
